query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO SECTION (CRF_VERSION_ID, STATUS_ID, LABEL, TITLE, INSTRUCTIONS, SUBTITLE, PAGE_NUMBER_LABEL, ORDINAL, PARENT_ID, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED,BORDERS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE SECTION SET CRF_VERSION_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?,LABEL=?, TITLE=?,INSTRUCTIONS=?,SUBTITLE=?,PAGE_NUMBER_LABEL=?,ORDINAL=?, DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=?,BORDERS=? WHERE SECTION_ID=?

query.name: findByVersionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM SECTION WHERE CRF_VERSION_ID=? order by section_id ASC

query.name: findAllByCRFVersion
query.sql: SELECT * FROM section WHERE crf_version_id=? order by section_id ASC

query.name: getNumItemsBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT section_id, count(*) as num_items FROM ITEM_FORM_METADATA M GROUP BY section_id

query.name: getNumItemsPlusRepeatBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND (D.status_id != 5 AND D.status_id != 7) AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsCompletedBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 2 AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsPendingBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 4 AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: findNext
query.sql: SELECT n.* FROM section n, section c WHERE n.crf_version_id = c.crf_version_id AND n.ordinal = c.ordinal + 1 AND c.crf_version_id = ? AND c.ordinal = ?

query.name: findPrevious
query.sql: SELECT n.* FROM section n, section c WHERE n.crf_version_id = c.crf_version_id AND n.ordinal = c.ordinal - 1 AND c.crf_version_id = ? AND c.ordinal = ?

query.name: countSCDItemBySectionId
query.sql: select count(item_form_metadata) from item_form_metadata where section_id = ? and length(simple_conditional_display) > 0
